<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Metabolize Element](/Feats.aspx?ID=2990) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 207 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Elementalist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=98)

**Prerequisites**
[Elementalist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2986)

**Trigger**
You take damage from a foe's spell or magical ability with the [air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5), [earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), or [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165) trait.

</column>

---

Your rapidly metabolize the elemental particles in your opponent's spell to gain a boost of energy. You gain the [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) condition until the end of your next turn. You can use the extra action only to Step or Stride.
name: Metabolize Element
